title: Lynda - Photoshop Retouching Techniques: Beauty Portraits with T
description:
Lynda - Photoshop Retouching Techniques: Beauty Portraits with Timothy Sexton 
1h 12m Intermediate | Uploaded in Nov 7, 2014 by 2boweb

Subjects:Photography, Portraits Retouching 
Software:Photoshop 

In this course, Timothy Sexton, senior retoucher at New York's Gloss Studio, builds the foundation for mastering the art of fashion retouching. The course begins with a discussion of how to evaluate an image and develop a retouching strategy that dovetails with the client's needs and the photographer's vision. Timothy also details an approach to file and layer management that simplifies creating multiple versions of a photo for client approval.Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Ã¢â‚¬Â¨Next, Timothy delves into several core aspects of retouchingÃ¢â‚¬â€skin, hair, clothing, and body shapingÃ¢â‚¬â€providing real-world insights and Adobe Photoshop techniques. The course describes ways to enhance eyes and lips, selectively sharpen portions of a photo to draw attention to them, use masks to change the color of clothing, and more. The course concludes with details on how to evaluate your work.
Topics include:

	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Managing layers
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Removing imperfections with the Clone Stamp and Quick Mask tools
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Using soft and hard brushes to clean up hair
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Refining the eyes and brows
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Plumping lips with Liquify
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Finalizing the color
	Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Finishing with Dodge and Burn
